meaning: adv. 从未；决不

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

报社

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

adv. 无论什么地方；究竟在哪里
grammar: wherever you go, wherever possible, no matter wherever, go wherever
example: Wherever you travel, remember to stay safe. 无论你去哪里旅行，记得保持安全。

meaning:
conj. 是否；不论
pron. 两个中的哪一个
grammar: whether or not, whether to do, no matter whether, decide whether
example: I'm not sure whether it will rain tomorrow. 我不确定明天是否会下雨。

meaning:
adj. 哪一个；哪一些
pron. 哪/那一个；哪/那一些
grammar: which one, which way, in which case, of which
example: Which book do you prefer, the red one or the blue one? 你更喜欢哪本书，红色的还是蓝色的？

meaning:
adj. 无论哪个；无论哪些
pron. 任何一个；无论哪个
grammar: whichever you choose, whichever way, whichever one
example: You can take whichever book you like from the shelf. 你可以从书架上拿任何一本你喜欢的书。

meaning:
conj. 虽然；然而；当……的时候
n. 一会儿；一段时间
vt. 消磨；轻松地度过
grammar: while doing sth, for a while, after a while, all the while
example: While reading the book, she fell asleep. 她在看书的时候睡着了。

meaning:
n. 鞭子；抽打；车夫； 搅拌器
vt. 抽打；煽动；搅打（蛋，奶油）；彻底击败
vi. 抽打；急走；拍击
grammar: whip up, whip into shape, have the whip hand
example: She used a whisk to whip the cream. 她用搅拌器搅打奶油。

meaning:
n. 私语；谣传；飒飒的声音
vi. 耳语；密谈；飒飒地响
vt. 低声说出
grammar: whisper to sb, in a whisper, whisper about
example: He whispered the secret to his friend. 他把秘密低声告诉了他的朋友。

meaning:
n. 口哨；汽笛；呼啸声
vt. 吹口哨；鸣汽笛
grammar: blow a whistle, whistle for, as clean as a whistle
example: The referee blew the whistle to start the game. 裁判吹哨开始比赛。

meaning:
n. 白色；洁白；白种人
adj. 白色的；白种的；纯洁的
grammar: white lie, white as snow, in black and white
example: She wore a beautiful white dress to the party. 她穿了一件漂亮的白色连衣裙去参加派对。

meaning: adj. 白发的；浅色头发的；受宠爱的
grammar: white-haired boy, white-haired girl
example: The white-haired old man told us stories from his youth. 那位白发老人给我们讲了他年轻时的故事。

meaning: pron. 谁；什么人
grammar: who is, who are, who knows, who cares
example: Who is the author of this book? 这本书的作者是谁？

meaning:
pron. 无论谁；任何人
n. 《爱谁谁》（电影名）
grammar: whoever wants, whoever comes, whoever it is
example: Whoever finishes first will get a prize. 无论谁先完成都会得到奖品。

meaning:
n. 整体；全部
adj. 完整的；纯粹的
grammar: as a whole, on the whole, whole life, whole heart
example: She spent the whole day studying for the exam. 她一整天都在为考试学习。

meaning: pron. 谁（who的宾格）
grammar: to whom, for whom, with whom, whom to trust
example: To whom did you give the letter? 你把信给了谁？

meaning: pron. 谁的（疑问代词）

meaning:
int. 哎呀！什么？
adv. 为什么
grammar: why not, why so, why bother, why me
example: Why are you late for school today? 你今天为什么上学迟到了？

meaning:

meaning: adv. 广泛地
grammar: widely used, widely known, widely accepted, widely spread

meaning: adj. 普遍的，广泛的；分布广的

meaning: n. 宽度；广度

meaning: n. 妻子，已婚妇女；夫人

example: His wife is a doctor at the local hospital. 他的妻子是当地医院的一名医生。

meaning:

meaning: n. 荒地；大量，茫茫一片

example: They got lost in the wilderness during their hike. 他们在徒步旅行时在荒野中迷路了。

meaning:
n. 野生动植物

grammar: wildlife conservation, wildlife protection, wildlife habitat, wildlife reserve
example: The government has established a wildlife reserve to protect endangered species. 政府建立了一个野生动物保护区来保护濒危物种。

meaning:
n. 意志；决心；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿

aux. 将；愿意；必须
grammar: will power, against one's will, at will, with a will
example: She succeeded through strong will power and determination. 她凭借坚强的意志力和决心取得了成功。

meaning:

grammar: be willing to do, willing helper, willing participant, willing cooperation
example: He is always willing to help others in need. 他总是乐意帮助有需要的人。

meaning:

grammar: win a prize, win over, win the game, win through

meaning:

meaning: n. 窗；窗口；窗户

meaning:

meaning:

meaning: n. 胜利者

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning: n. 妇女；女性；成年女子

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

meaning:

grammar: get worse, worse than, worse off, for better or worse

meaning:

grammar: a cup of yoghourt, low-fat yoghourt, fruit yoghourt, plain yoghourt
example: She enjoys having a cup of yoghourt for breakfast every morning. 她喜欢每天早上喝一杯酸奶当早餐。

meaning: n. 酸奶（等于yoghourt）；酸乳酪
grammar: Greek yoghurt, frozen yoghurt, yoghurt drink, probiotic yoghurt
example: Greek yoghurt is rich in protein and calcium. 希腊酸奶富含蛋白质和钙。

meaning: n. 酸奶酪， 酸乳（等于yoghurt）
grammar: yogurt maker, yogurt culture, yogurt parfait, yogurt smoothie
example: He made a delicious yogurt parfait with fresh berries. 他用新鲜浆果做了一个美味的酸奶冻糕。

meaning: pron. 你；你们
grammar: you and me, thank you, as you know, you bet
example: You should always be honest with your friends. 你应该始终对朋友诚实。

meaning:
n. 年轻人；（动物的）崽，仔
adj. 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
grammar: young people, young at heart, young adult, young and old
example: Young people today face many challenges in the job market. 今天的年轻人在就业市场面临许多挑战。

meaning: n. 年轻人；少年
grammar: energetic youngster, youngster's dream, group of youngsters, talented youngster
example: The energetic youngster won first prize in the competition. 这个精力充沛的年轻人在比赛中赢得了一等奖。

meaning: pron. 你的，你们的
grammar: your turn, your own, your best, your choice
example: Is this your book on the table? 桌子上的这本书是你的吗？

meaning:
pron. 你（们）的东西；你的责任；你的家属；来信，尊函
adj. 你（们）的（东西）；信末署名前用语
grammar: yours truly, yours sincerely, all yours, of yours
example: The red car is mine, and the blue one is yours. 红色的车是我的，蓝色的是你的。

meaning: pron. 你自己
grammar: by yourself, help yourself, enjoy yourself, be yourself
example: You need to believe in yourself to achieve your goals. 你需要相信自己才能实现目标。

meaning: pron. 你们自己；你们本人（yourself的复数）
grammar: by yourselves, help yourselves, enjoy yourselves, introduce yourselves
example: Please help yourselves to some snacks at the party. 请在聚会上随意享用一些零食。

meaning: n. 青年；青春；年轻；青少年时期
grammar: youth culture, youth hostel, youth movement, in one's youth
example: He spent his youth studying hard to become a doctor. 他年轻时努力学习，想成为一名医生。

meaning:
num. 零
n. 零点，零度
grammar: zero tolerance, zero in on, zero hour, below zero
example: The temperature dropped to zero degrees Celsius last night. 昨晚气温降到了零摄氏度。

meaning:
n. 拉链; 精力，活力; 尖啸声; 一种程序压缩格式
vt. 给予…速度; 用拉链拉上或扣上
vt.& vi. 尖啸而过; （使沿某方向）快速移动
grammar: zip up, zip code, zip line, zip file
example: Please remember to zip up your jacket before going outside. 出门前请记得拉上夹克的拉链。

meaning: 地带、地区（德语）
grammar: time zone, danger zone, comfort zone, no-parking zone
example: New York is in the Eastern Time Zone. 纽约位于东部时区。

meaning: n. 动物园; <美俚>（铁路货车的最后一节）守车; <美俚>核粒子园
grammar: go to the zoo, zoo keeper, zoo animal, zoo visit
example: The children were excited to see the pandas at the zoo. 孩子们在动物园看到熊猫时很兴奋。
